meanings: (한곳에) gather, flock, assemble, congregate, come[get] together, (만나다) meet
(돈·물건 등이) accumulate, be gathered, be collected, be amassed

vlive.korean: 지금 다 모이고 있죠? Is everyone gathering? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.79
이거 점점 모이고 있어 안 돼! They're slowly getting closer! No! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 연 날리기😆
시즌1 끝나고 촬영 끝나고도 자주 모이고 그랬어요? Did you see one another after having finished filming season1? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]에이틴2 공개수업(Feat. 제발회) / A-TEEN2 Open Class(Production Presentation)

examples.korean: The interest of the fans is collecting around whether or not the player will retire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 선수의 은퇴 여부에 팬들의 관심이 모이고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: The interest of the fans is collecting around whether or not the player will retire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ice collects around the soil speck and a snow crystal is formed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼음이 흙 알갱이 주변으로 모이고 눈의 결정이 형성됩니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Ice collects around the soil speck and a snow crystal is formed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is a crowd of people in the street. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거리에 사람이 많이 모이고 있다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: There is a crowd of people in the street. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And they are gathering in front of this statute to pray. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그리고 그들은 기도를 하기 위해 이 동상 앞으로 모이고 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: And they are gathering in front of this statute to pray. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A flashmob is when a large group of people quickly gather to perform together and then quickly separate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 플래시몹은 거대한 한 무리의 사람들이 함께 행동하기 위해 재빠르게 모이고 그 다음에 재빠르게 흩어지는 것입니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: A flashmob is when a large group of people quickly gather to perform together and then quickly separate. Add to Wordbook
